verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass on the day כַּלּ֨וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had fully מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> that Moses לְהָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וַיִּמְשַׁ֨ח <S%H4886><s%> and had anointed אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיְקַדֵּ֤שׁ <S%H6942><s%> it and sanctified אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> it and all the instruments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> thereof both the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> and all the vessels וַיִּמְשָׁחֵ֖ם <S%H4886><s%> thereof and had anointed וַיְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> them and sanctified אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיַּקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> offered נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> That the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> like נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> who [were] the princes הַמַּטֹּ֔ת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> and were over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were over הַפְּקֻדִֽים׃ <S%H6485><s%> them that were numbered

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנָ֜ם <S%H7133><s%> their offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶגְלֹ֥ת <S%H5699><s%> wagons צָב֙ <S%H6632><s%> covered וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> for two עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> and twelve בָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen עֲגָלָ֛ה <S%H5699><s%> a wagon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> for two הַנְּשִׂאִ֖ים <S%H5387><s%> of the princes וְשׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> an ox לְאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> and for each one וַיַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> and they brought אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> them before הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> Take מֵֽאִתָּ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהָי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לַעֲבֹ֕ד <S%H5647><s%> [it] of them that they may be to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> the service אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and thou shalt give אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> them unto the Levites אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to every man כְּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5656><s%> to his service

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲגָלֹ֖ת <S%H5699><s%> the wagons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> and the oxen וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> them unto the Levites

אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> Two הָעֲגָלֹ֗ת <S%H5699><s%> wagons וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> אַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> and four הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the sons גֵרְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon כְּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> according עֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> to their service

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> And four הָעֲגָלֹ֗ת <S%H5699><s%> wagons וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֹנַ֣ת <S%H8083><s%> and eight הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari כְּפִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> according עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <S%H5656><s%> unto their service בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> under the hand אִֽיתָמָ֔ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> But unto the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> none נָתָ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עֲבֹדַ֤ת <S%H5656><s%> because the service הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> on בַּכָּתֵ֖ף <S%H3802><s%> upon their shoulders יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> belonging unto them [was that] they should bear

וַיַּקְרִ֣יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> offered הַנְּשִׂאִ֗ים <S%H5387><s%> And the princes אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> חֲנֻכַּ֣ת <S%H2598><s%> for dedicating הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִמָּשַׁ֣ח <S%H4886><s%> that it was anointed אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיַּקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> offered הַנְּשִׂיאִ֛ם <S%H5387><s%> even the princes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנָ֖ם <S%H7133><s%> their offering לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> the altar

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses נָשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> prince אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> each לַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on his day נָשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> leader אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> each לַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day יַקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> They shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנָ֔ם <S%H7133><s%> their offering לַחֲנֻכַּ֖ת <S%H2598><s%> for the dedicating הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar ס

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמַּקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> And he that offered בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering נַחְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H5177><s%> was Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּינָדָ֖ב <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְקָרְבָּנ֞וֹ <S%H7133><s%> And his offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <S%H7086><s%> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> [was] one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <S%H3967><s%> thereof [was] an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <S%H4948><s%> the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <S%H4219><s%> bowl אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H8147><s%> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <S%H4392><s%> of them [were] full סֹ֛לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> for a meat offering
כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> spoon אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> One עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H6235><s%> of ten זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> [shekels] of gold מְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H4392><s%> full קְטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> of incense

פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock אֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> One בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> young אַ֧יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> one כֶּֽבֶשׂ־ <S%H3532><s%> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁנָת֖וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering
שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> One לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וּלְזֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> And for a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings בָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen שְׁנַיִם֒ <S%H8147><s%> two אֵילִ֤ם <S%H352><s%> rams חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> five עַתּוּדִ֣ים <S%H6260><s%> he goats חֲמִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H2568><s%> five כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year חֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H2568><s%> five זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> This קָרְבַּ֥ן <S%H7133><s%> this [was] the offering נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> of Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab פ

בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> On the second הִקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> did offer נְתַנְאֵ֣ל <S%H5417><s%> Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּעָ֑ר <S%H6686><s%> of Zuar נְשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> prince יִשָּׂשכָֽר׃ <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar

הִקְרִ֨ב <S%H7126><s%> He offered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <S%H7133><s%> [for] his offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <S%H7086><s%> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <S%H3967><s%> whereof [was] an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <S%H4948><s%> the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <S%H4219><s%> bowl אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H8147><s%> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <S%H4392><s%> of them full סֹ֛לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> for a meat offering
כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> spoon אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> One עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H6235><s%> of ten זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold מְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H4392><s%> [shekels] full קְטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> of incense

פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock אֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> One בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> young אַ֧יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> one כֶּֽבֶשׂ־ <S%H3532><s%> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁנָת֖וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering
שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> One לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וּלְזֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> And for a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings בָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen שְׁנַיִם֒ <S%H8147><s%> two אֵילִ֤ם <S%H352><s%> rams חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> five עַתּוּדִ֣ים <S%H6260><s%> he goats חֲמִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H2568><s%> five כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year חֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H2568><s%> five זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> This קָרְבַּ֥ן <S%H7133><s%> this [was] the offering נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> of Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> of Zuar פ
